entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is introduced as the one holding out his hand to Percy. He is described as a person who is part of the Weasley family.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is introduced as the one receiving Fred's hand. He is described as a person who is part of the Weasley family and is shown to be apologetic towards his father.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is introduced as the one bursting into tears and hugging Percy. She is described as a person who is part of the Weasley family.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is introduced as the father of Percy, whom he is hugging. He is described as a person who is part of the Weasley family.

relationships.description: Fred and Percy are shown to be hugging each other, indicating a close relationship between them. This is described in the text as 'a strangling hug'.
